product_description: Creating your own postcards is quick and easy with this 100 pack of Avery 8386 customizable postcards. Whether you want to add a personal touch to thank you postcards, event invitations, important announcements, or other marketing collateral, these printable cards are the perfect blank canvases for gorgeous custom designs. Cut from heavyweight white cardstock with a weight of 80 lbs / 216 gsm, every sheet features a series of meticulous perforations that make it easy to tear each card apart while still leaving behind a smooth, clean edge. The 8.5" x 11" printable postcard paper is optimized for inkjet printers, and both sides feature Print-to-the-Edge capability for stunning, double-sided full-bleed designs to the edge of the cards. Plus, the patented Sure Feed technology grip strip is designed to help alignment and reduce printer jams. Explore a variety of templates, tools, and designs when using Avery Design & Print Online and create personalized we’ve moved postcards, menu cards, save the dates, and anything else you can imagine. These 4" x 6" postcards meet U.S. postal regulations for mailing, which means you just need the address and proper postage, and it’s good to go. No envelopes needed!

short_description: Create your own customizable cards for a variety of different uses with Avery card template Presta 95273
The versatile rectangle postcard size meets USPS size and thickness requirements for postcards while also being great for other projects

product_description: Easily create your own postcards, index cards, thank you cards, holiday cards, menu cards, RSVP cards, promotional pieces, and more with Avery Matte White Rectangle Cards. Compatible with USPS size and thickness requirements, Avery postcards are durable enough to be mailable while also being the perfect size for a variety of other uses. Created with heavyweight and durable 80lb / 216 gsm cardstock, the smooth matte material is a versatile fit for any project or event. Printable on both sides and compatible with laser and inkjet printers, the matte white cards let you create professional designs with a desktop printer. Avery cards are carefully constructed with patented features to provide the best results. The print-to-the-edge layout lets you print all the way to the edge of the card. Microperforated with a series of precise cuts, just fold and tear away to leave behind a soft border without any jagged edges. Easily customize cards with your own logos, art, symbols, and messaging by using the templates and designs in Avery Design & Print. Printable on both sides, these cards make it easy to show different information on the front and back. For best results, use the card setting on your printer and feed one sheet at a time. Whether you’re a business owner that wants to add more flair to products, a party organizer trying to elevate an event, or a teacher looking to step up class projects, Avery rectangle cards make it easy to translate your designs into reality.

name: Avery Printable Index Cards, Sure Feed Technology, 3" x 5", Matte White, Laser & Inkjet Compatible, 150 Blank Cards Total, Great for Product Branding, Marketing, and More (5388)
short_description: Show off your brand: Stand out with personalized index cards made from premium 65 lb / 176 gsm matte white cardstock, great for branding, announcements, thank you cards, marketing, and more
Enjoy smooth separation: Printable cards stay flat and secure during printing, then detach cleanly with precise micro-perforations for polished, professional-looking edges
Print with confidence: Compatible with laser and inkjet printers, Avery index cards with Sure Feed technology provides a more reliable feed to reduce misalignments and printer jams
Design your way: Use Avery Design & Print to create stunning, double-sided designs on the front and back of each card to showcase more details and maximize your message
Easily create custom index cards: Design and print your own flash cards, note cards, recipe cards, save the date cards, and more using Avery Design & Print, or personalize by hand
product_description: Elevate the way you share information with Avery 5388 Printable 3" x 5" Index Cards. Made from premium 65 lb / 176 gsm matte white cardstock, these blank index cards are designed to deliver a professional look and feel. Whether you’re creating study aids, thank you note cards, RSVP cards, event reminders, or announcements, these versatile cards adapt to all your needs. Featuring precise micro-perforations, each card separates cleanly for smooth edges and a polished finish. No ragged tears or uneven sides—just neat, professional-quality results. Compatible with both laser and inkjet printers, these Avery cards produce sharp text and vibrant graphics, with the flexibility to print on both the front and back. Built-in Sure Feed technology helps guide each sheet more reliably through your printer, reducing misalignments, printer jams, and wasted prints. Printable cardstock stays flat during printing, and cards remain attached to the sheet until you’re ready to separate them. For best results, select your printer’s card setting and feed one sheet at a time. Then finish your project your way by customizing your cards with Avery Design & Print and the available Avery templates, or personalize each card by hand for unique, one-of-a-kind creations.
